alert.note: Alert for Jefferson (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 12 at 10:58AM MDT until June 15 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM MDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of northeast Colorado, including the following county, Jefferson. * WHEN...Until 200 PM MDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1058 AM MDT, Doppler radar and automated rain gauges indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Between 0.5 and 0.8 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Southwestern Denver, Lakewood, southern Wheat Ridge, eastern Golden, Morrison, Edgewater, Ken Caryl and Columbine.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
